DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine adult improve physical activity level eat habit use interactive web-based weight control program regular contact dietician .
DOC.brief_title: A Pilot Weight Control Intervention HPHC
DOC.detailed_description: - All study participant must regular access Internet , however , study provide access . Participants randomly place one two study group ( Group 1 Group 2 ) . - Group 1 participant ask make 3 in-person visit , last 75-90 minute . The following information collect : name , mail address , telephone number , email address . During study visit , follow measurement take : height , weight , waist circumference , blood pressure dietary pattern . - Group 1 participant also receive counsel around diet physical activity register dietician ask use specialize website allow track eat physical activity pattern , learn new weight management skill , interact dietician , receive support participant . - Group 1 also receive 5 telephone counsel call health counselor . During telephone call , teach participant new skill track diet physical activity , goal-setting staying motivate . - Group 2 participant ask make 2 in-person visit , last 75-90 minute length . The following information collect : name , mail address , telephone number . During study visit , follow measurement take : height , weight , waist circumference , blood pressure dietary pattern .
DOC.criteria: 25 65 year age Body mass index 3040 kg/m2 Nonsmoker ( quit within previous 6 month ) Comfort read speak English Stage 1 hypertension Not currently pregnant Regular web access home
